title: Hogwarts Houses
description: Test your knowledge of the four Hogwarts houses!

questions.question: What are the colors of Gryffindor house?
questions.explanation: Gryffindor's colors are scarlet red and gold, with a lion as its symbol!

questions.question: Slytherin's animal symbol is a snake.
questions.explanation: Slytherin's symbol is a serpent, fitting since founder Salazar Slytherin was a Parselmouth (could speak to snakes)!

questions.question: Which house values intelligence and wisdom?
questions.explanation: Ravenclaw values wit, learning, and wisdom. Its members are known for their cleverness and creativity!

questions.question: What trait does Hufflepuff most value?
questions.explanation: Hufflepuff values hard work, patience, loyalty, and fair play. Cedric Diggory was a famous Hufflepuff!

questions.question: The Sorting Hat was originally owned by Godric Gryffindor.
questions.explanation: The four founders enchanted Godric Gryffindor's hat to sort students after they were gone!

questions.question: Who is the head of Slytherin house when Harry attends Hogwarts?
questions.explanation: Severus Snape is the head of Slytherin and Potions Master, though he was secretly protecting Harry all along!

questions.question: What animal represents Ravenclaw?
questions.explanation: Despite the name, Ravenclaw's symbol is actually an eagle! The house colors are blue and bronze.

questions.question: Draco Malfoy is in Slytherin house.
questions.explanation: Draco Malfoy is sorted into Slytherin immediately, following his family's tradition of being in that house!
